name: Logic Hop HubSpot Add-on
author: Logic Hop

sections.description:
The Logic Hop HubSpot Add-on brings the power of personalization to WordPress with HubSpot.

Apply the same approach to your WordPress site that you do with your email campaigns.

Compatible with HUBSPOT PRIVATE APP SETTINGS, OFFERING MUCH MORE GRANULARITY to your rules.

Logic Hop SaaS
Logic Hop is a standalone Software as a Service (SaaS). You must have an Logic Hop account in order to take advantage of this plugin. Click here to create your account.

Get personal and make sales with HubSpot!

Finally you can use HubSpot data in WordPress to automate your website marketing.

With the Logic Hop HubSpot Add-on you can easily:

  • Message visitors directly – Show user’s name and location
  • Upsell premium products to your best customers
  • Offer coupon codes to tagged subscribers

Logic Hop SaaS
Logic Hop is a standalone Software as a Service (SaaS). You must have an Logic Hop account in order to take advantage of this plugin. Click here to create your account.

Create personalized experiences for your HubSpot subscribers.

The Logic Hop HubSpot Add-on is a WordPress plugin that extends the functionality of Logic Hop. With the plugin you can display HubSpot data to your subscribers and personalize your website.

HubSpot data can be used with any Logic Hop condition while Logic Hop goals let you add or remove subscriber tags and update custom field data.

Features:

  • Display HubSpot data
  • Display content based on HubSpot data
  • Works with any Logic Hop Condition

Requirements:

  • Logic Hop 3+ Plugin
  • HubSpot Account
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Compatible with HUBSPOT PRIVATE APP OAUTH

1.0.1

  • WordPress 6.0
  • php 8.0
  • Fix errors when getting remote data

1.0.0

  • WordPress 5.9

0.9.2

  • IMPORTANT: View the update notice before updating – https://logichop.com/docs/logic-hop-update-notices/
  • Fixed Site Health Status Critical Issue “An active PHP session was detected”= 0.9.2 =
  • IMPORTANT: View the update notice before updating – https://logichop.com/docs/logic-hop-update-notices/
  • Fixed Site Health Status Critical Issue “An active PHP session was detected”
